---
#########################################################
# Steps to use this reflection template:
#   1. Edit the title to include the correct week in place of XX
#   2. Add your name to the author field of the yaml header
#   3. Write your reflection below the yaml header
#   4. Click on "Knit" directly above to render output (or Ctrl/Cmd-Shift-K)
#   5. Download the resulting file reflection-week-01.pdf
#   6. Upload reflection-week-01.pdf to canvas
# You can make copies of the template to use each week
#   1. Select the template file in the Files pane (using the tickbox)
#   2. Within the Files pane, click More --> Copy
# That way you can use this project for all your reflections this semester
#########################################################
title: "Reflection - Week XX"
author: "Your Name Here"
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%B %d, %Y')`"
output: pdf_document
---

Write your reflection here.

You are welcome (but not expected) to use markdown to customize formatting and code chunks to incorporate code and/or data.
